description: A robot girl who befriends Casshern and manages to maintain her innocence despite living after the world destruction. Although she witnessed Casshern mercilessly killing a robot in order to save her, she gradually opens up her heart to him. Ohji handles her maintenance. Both her and Ohji seem to have a habit of turning up where Casshern is, whether intentional or not they`re usually witnesses to the end results of Casshern`s actions.
name: Ringo
